Name: Slit Mouthed - 口裂け女
About the game: Check our other game out! / Slit Mouthed - 口裂け女 is based on a famous Japanese urban legend called The Slit Mouthed Woman, staying true to the legend while adding our own twist to it we are certain that you will enjoy the gameplay. Key Features: Multiple Endings Atmospheric environment. Great storytelling. enemy AI Japanese Voice Acting (日本の声優) Summary You are 2 security guards working the night-shift in a mansion, the owner of that mansion experienced some 'strange events', trying to go through your checklist, you soon face those 'strange events' as well.
